articles.title: Dakota Johnson Joins Chris Martin's Kids Apple and Moses at Coldplay's Glastonbury Set - E! Online - E! NEWS
articles.description: Chris Martin's partner Dakota Johnson and kids Apple and Moses supported him as he performed with Coldplay at the Glastonbury festival.
articles.content:
Glastonbury was a full family affair for Chris Martin.
The Coldplay frontman's partner Dakota Johnson and children Apple Martin, 20, and Moses Martin, 18whom he shares with ex-wife Gwyneth Paltrowwe… [+701 chars]
